Wife is in bed pregnant and not happy that I’m in the living room watching
Replays of old games. She came out and got upset with me that I was still up. I told her that I realized that Tuiaki got more conservative as the years went on that he was at BYU. I told her I was so grateful for Jay Hill. She told me I wish you were as grateful for me and the baby as you are for Jay Hill and the BYU defense. I guess I’m going to bed.
GOCOUGS!
